籤詩版本二:
Kar ka saurari maganar banza da gaskiya, da safe da magariba sai ka karanta Ami.
Idan kalmomin daji gaskiya ne, littafin "Yadda za a Dakatar da Yunwa" yana da kalmar "jama'a", kuma wannan ita ce kalmar "kyautar".
詩意:
Wannan hexagram yana wakiltar alamar biredi don gamsar da yunwa.
Komai ya fi komai da komai kuma ba na gaske bane.
解曰: Idan hankali bai tabbata ba, ba shi da amfani a karanta nassosi. Kamar kek ɗin fenti, abincin yana da wuyar haɗiye.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Kalmomin Cao Cao game da plums suna kashe ƙishirwa
A lokacin Mulkin Uku, Cao Cao ya jagoranci sojojinsa, an yi rashin ruwa a lokacin rani kuma sojoji suna jin ƙishirwa, Cao Cao ya yi ƙarya cewa akwai dajin plum a gaba, kuma yana iya cin plum a wurin don ya kashe ƙishirwa.
(Maganar nan “kallon furen plum don kashe ƙishirwa” ta fito ne daga nan. Ya yarda da “fina waina don gamsar da yunwa”.
聖意: Yi addu'a don samun sa'a a cikin gidanka (marasa kyau), sa'a a cikin arziki (kada ku yi tunani game da shi), mu'amala mai laushi ( jira minti daya), cikas ga aure (cikin wofi), masu tafiya a ƙasa, tsutsotsi na siliki, yana da kyau a shuka. Dabbobi shida da wuri, rashin samun mutane (wahala), shari'ar jama'a da (kada ku ji daɗi) Hijira na ra'ayin mazan jiya, asarar dukiya, cuta, da fatan alheri ga tsaunuka da kaburbura.
古人: Cao Cao yayi magana game da plums yana kashe ƙishirwa
第X籤: Kuri'a na Sha Bakwai na Nasara (Lottery)
